message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm confident you'll find it's worth it.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I'd like to propose a price of $95.
I'm glad we're close, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product.
